1.0.1.name: wordpress/archive-remote-images
1.0.1.description:
Advanced remote images grabber, automatically save the remote picture to the local, saves them directly into your blog media directory, and attaches to the appointed post. Totaly auto save image in your post/page content. Just simple setting, it will help you transfer the image from remote website into your local, you can choose for single preference, if some post need not transfer the images. inspired from Cache Images.

Following links can help you:

  • Details and video tutorial (FAQ .etc)
  • Support forum
  • Author home page
  • Free WordPress themes
  • Other plugins from lookingimage.com
